sentences.sContent: This study used constructivist as the research philosophy and a deductive approach, it adopted qualitative research methods, a semi-structured interview and a desk research tool.
sentences.sContent_eng: This study used constructivist as the research philosophy and a deductive approach, it adopted qualitative research methods, a semi-structured interview and a desk research tool.
sentences.sCn: 本研究采用建构主义作为研究哲学和演绎的方法，它通过定性研究方法，半结构化面试和案头研究工具。

remMethod.val: 来自construct(v. 构造， 建造)
